basic.Target Organism: [Ref.28073163] Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus megaterium ATCC 14581 (IC50 = 237 μM, MIC > 20 μM), Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538 (IC50 = 188 μM, MIC > 20 μM), Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212 (IC50 = 134 μM, MIC > 20 μM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 700926 (IC50 = 805 μM, MIC > 20 μM);Fungi:Candida albicans 002 ATCC 64385 (IC50 = 20 μM, MIC > 20 μM), C. albicans 004 ATCC MYA-2876 (IC50 = 20 μM, MIC > 20 μM).
